content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and received a command to browse a website about artificial intelligence. The website provided an overview of AI, including its history, sub-fields, and different types such as reasoning, problem-solving, knowledge representation, learning, natural language processing, and perception. The website also covered different techniques and tools used in AI and briefly touched on applications in legal informatics. However, it did not provide a comprehensive list of the different types of AI.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence", "question": "What is artificial intelligence?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of overviews, articles, and references related to artificial intelligence (AI), covering its history, development, applications, techniques, philosophical and ethical debates, potential risks and benefits, and regulation. It provides a broad understanding of the complex and multifaceted nature of AI and offers a range of perspectives and insights on the subject.', type='action_result')]
"""
